hopobject.name: Prototyping Expansion Board
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.3) Gecko/20100401 Firefox/3.6.3 (.NET CLR 3.5.30729)
hopobject.body:
The Trainer board is an expansion/breakout board for the BeagleBoard that provides the following:
- I2C interface (level translated to +3.3V or +5V) - SPI interface (level translated to +3.3V) - GPIO's (level translated to +3.3V) - Standard prototyping area with 0.1" x 0.1" matrix
- Embedded ATmega328 processor that can be user programmed. The ATmega328 can be jumpered to run at 3.3V or 5V - Arduino compatible ATmega328 - The BeagleBoard can communicate to the ATmega328 processor via its second RS232 serial port - The BeagleBoard can turn the power to the ATmega328 on or off with one of it's GPIO pins
The Trainer board attaches to the BeagleBoard via the expansion connector. The Trainer connects to the back of the BeagleBoard and is the same physical size: 3.1" x 3.0"
hopobject.shortdesc: The Trainer board is an expansion/breakout board for the BeagleBoard that provides level translated interfaces for: I2C, SPI, multiple GPIO's, standard prototyping area, Arduino compatible ATmega328.
